// Format partner delegation email with inline CSS HTML template const data = $input.first().json.body; console.log('üìß Partner Delegation Email Request:', data); if (!data.email || !data.delegateName || !data.partnerName) { throw new Error('Missing required fields: email, delegateName, or partnerName'); } // Build personalized delegation email content const emailSubject = `Complete Your Pre-Onboarding - ${data.partnerName} Partnership with The Power100`; // Inline CSS HTML template with Power100 branding const emailBodyHTML = `

The Power100 Experience

Strategic Partnership Delegation

Pre-Onboarding Required

Dear ${data.delegateName},

You have been designated as the key contact for ${data.partnerName}'s partnership with The Power100 Experience.

Action Required:

Complete Step 8 Pre-Onboarding to activate your partnership and begin receiving qualified contractor referrals.

Timeline: Please complete within 48 hours to maintain your priority status.

Complete Pre-Onboarding

‚ö° What You'll Complete:

  • Partnership agreement and terms
  • Service capability verification
  • Lead routing and communication preferences
  • PowerConfidence scoring setup

Questions about the pre-onboarding process?

Contact our Partnership Team: partnerships@power100.io | (555) 100-POWER

Ready to transform contractor partnerships together!

The Power100 Partnership Team

tpx.power100.io | power100.io

This email was sent to ${data.email} as the designated contact for ${data.partnerName}.

¬© 2024 The Power100 Experience. All rights reserved.

`; const emailBodyPlain = `Dear ${data.delegateName}, You have been designated as the key contact for ${data.partnerName}'s partnership with The Power100 Experience. ACTION REQUIRED: Complete Step 8 Pre-Onboarding To activate your partnership and begin receiving qualified contractor referrals, please complete the pre-onboarding process within 48 hours. What You'll Complete: ‚Ä¢ Partnership agreement and terms ‚Ä¢ Service capability verification ‚Ä¢ Lead routing and communication preferences ‚Ä¢ PowerConfidence scoring setup Complete Pre-Onboarding: ${data.preOnboardingLink || 'https://tpx.power100.io/partner/onboarding/delegation'} Questions? Contact our Partnership Team: Email: partnerships@power100.io Phone: (555) 100-POWER Ready to transform contractor partnerships together! The Power100 Partnership Team tpx.power100.io | power100.io This email was sent to ${data.email} as the designated contact for ${data.partnerName}. ¬© 2024 The Power100 Experience. All rights reserved.`; return [{ json: { // Email data email: data.email, delegateName: data.delegateName, partnerName: data.partnerName, subject: emailSubject, htmlBody: emailBodyHTML, plainBody: emailBodyPlain, // GHL Contact data contactId: data.contactId || null, locationId: "Jlq8gw3IEjAQu39n4c0s", // Tracking partnerId: data.partnerId, delegateId: data.delegateId, preOnboardingLink: data.preOnboardingLink || 'https://tpx.power100.io/partner/onboarding/delegation', emailType: 'partner_delegation', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() } }];
